pullrequest.title: Moved assertion to prevent error in semi supervised mode

content.raw:
Yes, the error with semi-supervised mode in the identify task is a known issue (see Issue #6).
After seeing what the assertion outputs, it would be great to get a string to follow the assert for a useful error message to follow the AssertionError.

e.g.
```python
assert "supervisionLabel" not in tracknames,\
'"supervisionLabel" label is internally reserved and not allowed in supplied track names"
```
or something along those lines.

Otherwise everything looks good to me.
content.html:
Yes, the error with semi-supervised mode in the identify task is a known issue (see Issue #6). After seeing what the assertion outputs, it would be great to get a string to follow the assert for a useful error message to follow the AssertionError.

e.g.

'"supervisionLabel" label is internally reserved and not allowed in supplied track names"

or something along those lines.
